Draft Rating:

A+

Billy King ranks in the 96th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. King's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 13 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Andre Iguodala with 9th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Lou Williams with 45th pick but was worth 3th pick.
  • Drafted Mason Plumlee with 22th pick but was worth 5th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Samuel Dalembert with 26th pick but was worth 42th pick.
  • Drafted Larry Hughes with 8th pick but was worth 23th pick.

Trade Rating:

D-

Billy King ranks in the 26th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Roshown McLeod, Dikembe Mutombo to PHI.
  • Lost Toni Kukoč, Nazr Mohammed, Theo Ratliff, Pepe Sánchez to ATL.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Gerald Wallace to BRK.
  • Lost Mehmet Okur, Shawne Williams, Damian Lillard to POR.

Signing Rating:

D

Billy King ranks in the 30th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Brook Lopez in 2015.
  • Signed George Lynch in 1999.
  • Signed Andray Blatche in 2012.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Bojan Bogdanović in 2014.
  • Signed Matt Geiger in 1999.
  • Signed Stephen Graham in 2010.
